response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product offers unparalleled capabilities and efficiency, setting new standards in its field. Given its innovative features and market impact, we believe it's worth more than a million dollars. Therefore, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this game-changing product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-value asset at a premium discount. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
